fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Budget, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: Zapaden park 130, vh. B, floor 2, apt.6
eu_initiatives: Za Zemiata promotes sustainable solutions in energy and climate, zero waste practices, food sovereignty and organic farming, air quality and urban environment, strategic use of public funds to drive environmental protection and long-term wellbeing for people and other species alike.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Za Zemiata is the Bulgarian member of the largest international network of environmental organisations, Friends of the Earth (www.foeeurope.org, www.foei.org). We are part of a number of issue-based national and international NGO networks including: CEE Bankwatch (http://bankwatch.org/), Climate Action Network – Europe (www.climnet.org/), Global Alliance for Incineration Alternatives (www.no-burn.org), Zero Waste Europe (www.zerowasteeurope.eu) Climate Action Bulgaria Coalition (www.climatebg.org), For the Nature (www.forthenature.org), etc.
goals__remit: Za Zemiata (ZZ) is an independent non-profit non-governmental organization established in 1995 to work for environmental justice and sustainable and equitable life on our planet, without exploitation of people or nature.
relevant_communication: We work through awareness raising and capacity building to mobilise and empower local communities to take action on a variety of environmental conflicts, e.g. unsustainable energy projects, air pollution, mining (gold, uranium, coal), waste incineration and landfills, damage of protected areas, tax justice, etc.
